select act_Object_id actObjectId, act_type actType from sys_company_users where id = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT users.id FROM sys_company_users users WHERE FIND_IN_SET(users.id, (SELECT CONCAT(detail.emergency_person,",",detail.no_emergency_person) FROM cfg_dispatch_route route LEFT JOIN cfg_dispatch_route_detail detail ON route.id=detail.route_id WHERE detail.region=#{serviceCity} AND route.flag_take_status=1
AND route.project_id=#{projectId} AND route.flag_project=1
AND route.flag_project=0
AND route.flag_default=0 GROUP BY detail.region) ) LEFT JOIN dmi_company_info company ON users.company_id=company.id AND users.flag_deleted = 0 AND company.flag_deleted=0 AND users.flag_open_status=1 AND company.company_type = 'PLATFORM'
SELECT u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.real_name realName FROM sys_company_users u where u.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and u.flag_deleted=0

SELECT users.id,relation.role_id roleId FROM sys_company_users users LEFT JOIN sys_company_user_role_relation relation ON users.id=relation.user_id WHERE users.flag_deleted=0 AND relation.flag_deleted=0 AND users.flag_admin=1 AND users.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT users.id, users.nickname, users.username, users.head_portrait_url, users.create_time, users.update_time, users.flag_deleted, users.act_type, users.act_Object_id, users.flag_open_status, users.email, users.flag_available,users.company_id,users.mobile,users.real_name FROM sys_company_users users LEFT JOIN dmi_company_info company ON users.company_id=company.id WHERE users.flag_deleted = 0 AND company.flag_deleted=0 AND company.company_type = #{companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
